tests.name: Root Navigation
tests.description: Navigate to root URL should show current moment
expectedBehavior: Displays the current moment based on today's date

tests.name: Timeline Click Updates URL
tests.description: Clicking on a timeline entry should update the URL correctly
expectedBehavior: URL updates to the correct format: /moments/{city}/{YYYY-MM-DD}/
Moment is displayed in the overlay/map

tests.name: Direct URL Navigation
tests.description: Navigating directly to a moment URL should land on that moment
expectedBehavior: Moment is correctly identified and displayed
Timeline scrolls to and highlights the correct moment
Map zooms to the correct location
